full_summary:
================

**National Learning Roadmap for Expertise at ESDC (NLREE) - Skills Identification, Design and Courses Development**

**Tender Information**

*   **Reference Number**: cb-238-68048056
*   **Solicitation Number**: 100024396/A
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-11-20
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-14T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Procurement Details**

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Project Description**

The College@ESDC is seeking a team of learning experts, including a Learning Advisor, a Learning Designer, and a Project Manager to contribute to the development of the National Learning Roadmap for Expertise at ESDC. The team will be responsible for identifying position-specific functions and related skills, designing blueprints, and developing fully accessible instructional materials for Business and Program expertise positions. The project aims to establish a comprehensive learning roadmap that addresses the skills and knowledge requirements for various roles within ESDC.

**Contact Information**

*   **Contact Name**: Yves Cormier
*   **Email**: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (438) 462-8563
*   **Address**: 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0J9, Canada

**Attachments**

The tender package, including the solicitation document, can be downloaded from the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25326/100024396a-npp-en.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25326/100024396a-npp-fr_0.pdf (French). 

Please note that the tender has expired on 2023-12-14T14:00:00.   Top of the  goodwork! This rewritten entry is more concise
